other_tests.findings: Baseline IGF-I was low and responded only to a high dose of GH.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 2.56 yr, plasma IGF-I was normal and responded well to a high dose of GH.

other_tests.findings: His height was /H110024.4, BMI SDS was /H110011.1, and bone age 1.3 yr.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Four weeks after transplantation, plasma IGF-I was normal.

other_tests.findings: Fibroblasts isolated from the patient showed no response to GH and IGF-I despite positive stimulation in controls.
Brisk GH secretion with peak GH level of 70 mU/liter.
